docs.text: Overview ¶ This package parses and produces strings representing ISO8601 timestamps and durations.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: This package parses and produces strings representing ISO8601 timestamps and durations.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: jetblack_serialization ¶ module jetblack_iso8601 ¶ Summary ¶ ISO 8601 Description ¶ Utilities for converting dates and durations to and from ISO 8601 format. function jetblack_iso8601 . datetime_to_iso8601 ¶ Summary ¶ Convert datetime to ISO 8601 jetblack_iso8601 . datetime_to_iso8601 ( timestamp : datetime ) -> str Parameters ¶ timestamp : datetime The timestamp Returns ¶ str : The stringified ISO 8601 version of the timestamp function jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_datetime ¶ Summary ¶ Parse an ISO 8601 datetime. jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_datetime ( value : str ) -> Optional[datetime] Parameters ¶ value : str The ISO 8601 date string Returns ¶ Optional[datetime] : A timestamp if the value could be parsed, otherwise None. function jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_timedelta ¶ Summary ¶ Convert an ISO 8601 duration to a timedelta jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_timedelta ( duration : str ) -> Optional[timedelta] Parameters ¶ duration : str An ISO 8601 format duration Returns ¶ Optional[timedelta] : The duration as a timedelta if the string could be parsed, otherwise None. function jetblack_iso8601 . timedelta_to_iso8601 ¶ Summary ¶ Convert a timedelta to an ISO 8601 duration string Description ¶ Prefers weeks to days, so a roundtrip of P7D becomes P1W. Also an zero value is removed. A zero duration becomes P0D. jetblack_iso8601 . timedelta_to_iso8601 ( value : timedelta ) -> str Parameters ¶ value : timedelta A timedelta Returns ¶ str : The ISO 8601 duration representation of the timedelta.
docs.title: jetblack_iso8601

docs.text: ISO 8601
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Utilities for converting dates and durations to and from ISO 8601 format.
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Convert datetime to ISO 8601 jetblack_iso8601 . datetime_to_iso8601 ( timestamp : datetime ) -> str
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: timestamp : datetime The timestamp
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: str : The stringified ISO 8601 version of the timestamp
docs.title: Returns

docs.text: Parse an ISO 8601 datetime. jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_datetime ( value : str ) -> Optional[datetime]
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: value : str The ISO 8601 date string
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: Optional[datetime] : A timestamp if the value could be parsed, otherwise None.
docs.title: Returns

docs.text: Convert an ISO 8601 duration to a timedelta jetblack_iso8601 . iso8601_to_timedelta ( duration : str ) -> Optional[timedelta]
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: duration : str An ISO 8601 format duration
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: Optional[timedelta] : The duration as a timedelta if the string could be parsed, otherwise None.
docs.title: Returns

docs.text: Convert a timedelta to an ISO 8601 duration string
docs.title: Summary

docs.text: Prefers weeks to days, so a roundtrip of P7D becomes P1W. Also an zero value is removed. A zero duration becomes P0D. jetblack_iso8601 . timedelta_to_iso8601 ( value : timedelta ) -> str
docs.title: Description

docs.text: value : timedelta A timedelta
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: str : The ISO 8601 duration representation of the timedelta.
docs.title: Returns

docs.text: Installation ¶ The package can be installed with pip. pip install jetblack-iso8601
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: The package can be installed with pip. pip install jetblack-iso8601
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Usage ¶ Timestamps ¶ Timestamps can be parsed with iso8601_to_datetime and converted to a string with datetime_to_iso8601 . from jetblack_iso8601 import ( iso8601_to_datetime , datetime_to_iso8601 ) text = '2014-02-01T09:28:56.321-10:00' timestamp = iso8601_to_datetime ( text ) roundtrip = datetime_to_iso8601 ( timestamp ) assert text == roundtrip Durations ¶ Timestamps can be parsed with iso8601_to_timedelta and converted to a string with datetime_to_iso8601 . from jetblack_iso8601 import ( iso8601_to_timedelta , timedelta_to_iso8601 ) text = 'P3Y2M1DT12H11M10S' value = iso8601_to_timedelta ( text ) roundtrip = timedelta_to_iso8601 ( value ) assert roundtrip == text
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: Timestamps can be parsed with iso8601_to_datetime and converted to a string with datetime_to_iso8601 . from jetblack_iso8601 import ( iso8601_to_datetime , datetime_to_iso8601 ) text = '2014-02-01T09:28:56.321-10:00' timestamp = iso8601_to_datetime ( text ) roundtrip = datetime_to_iso8601 ( timestamp ) assert text == roundtrip
docs.title: Timestamps

docs.text: Timestamps can be parsed with iso8601_to_timedelta and converted to a string with datetime_to_iso8601 . from jetblack_iso8601 import ( iso8601_to_timedelta , timedelta_to_iso8601 ) text = 'P3Y2M1DT12H11M10S' value = iso8601_to_timedelta ( text ) roundtrip = timedelta_to_iso8601 ( value ) assert roundtrip == text
docs.title: Durations
